Content.Text:
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, what a fantastic place!
That looks interesting over there.
<PAGE>
This would make a good article for the
newspaper... oops! Shouldn't be talking
work on our vacation!
<PAGE>
Forget about work!
Let's enjoy the day!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whew, I'm beat...
Air travel isn't as easy as they say...
<PAGE>
But since we spent the money for the
trip, I'll find the strength somehow!
Let's enjoy ourselves here, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are we...there yet?
I was looking forward to coming here...
Let's look around, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha! You slept like a rock on the plane!
Have you been working THAT hard?
<PAGE>
Today it's just the two of us, so let's
relax and let our cares slip away!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I'm so hungry!
Are there any famous restaurants here?
If so, I want to go for a meal there!
<PAGE>
Maybe I can figure out their recipes
and use them back at the restaurant!
Let's go gourmet cuisine hunting!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What curse lies on your human vehicles
to make them shake so hideously?
I feel most ill as a result!
<PAGE>
If you had simply asked me, I could have
transported us with my magic!
<PAGE>
But I understand, I must accommodate
myself to human ways.
Troublesome ways though they are...
<PAGE>
Be that as it may, we are here!
Let us frolic at once! Let us make fond
memories the Harvest Goddess shall envy!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's get going! If we were staying the
night we could lollygag around, but
we're on a schedule here!
<PAGE>
Don't worry about a thing, <MYNAME>.
Just follow me and we'll be fine.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All RIGHT, we're HERE!
<PAGE>
I've been DYING to do this trip!
Aren't you excited?
Let's have a blast every minute of it!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now this is impressive!
My reporting has taken me to many lands,
but I see much of interest here.
<PAGE>
You have fun while I poke around a
little, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am not accustomed to air travel!
I feel like my body's still vibrating!
<PAGE>
How can Charles be so calm about it?
<PAGE>
I'm going to have a little rest, so you
enjoy yourself, <MYNAME>.
I'll join you later.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ugh! We're finally here!
<PAGE>
That took forever!
And Charles calls this relaxing?
You can't trust a word that guy says!
<PAGE>
But, no point freaking out about it.
Let's go see the sights!
C'mon, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, here we are! Perhaps I will
introduce aircraft in my country! A most
convenient way to travel abroad! 
<PAGE>
Oh my! 
Forgive me for talking politics...
Let's enjoy our time here!
